SELECT ai.player_id, ai.attendance_year, ai.attendance_month, ai.sick_leave_day, ai.absenteeism_day, ai.personal_leave_day FROM attendance_info ai LEFT JOIN player_info pi ON pi.key_id = tpi.player_id AND pi.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ni.delete_flag = 0
AND pi.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{qry.userName}, '%')
AND ni.notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{qry.noticeTitle}, '%')
ORDER BY ni.release_time DESC
